summary.para: In-memory object representation of an INI file.
This class is a read-only collection of objects.

member.name: M:IniFile.Ini.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new empty instance of the class with the default settings.

member.name: M:IniFile.Ini.#ctor(IniFile.IniLoadSettings)
member.summary: Initializes a new empty instance of the class with the specified settings.

member.name: M:IniFile.Ini.#ctor(System.IO.FileInfo,IniFile.IniLoadSettings)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class and loads the data from the specified file.

member.name: M:IniFile.Ini.#ctor(System.String,IniFile.IniLoadSettings)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class and loads the data from the specified file.

member.name: M:IniFile.Ini.#ctor(System.IO.Stream,IniFile.IniLoadSettings)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class and loads the data from the specified stream.

member.name: M:IniFile.Ini.#ctor(System.IO.TextReader,IniFile.IniLoadSettings)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class and loads the data from the specified .

member.name: M:IniFile.Ini.Load(System.String,IniFile.IniLoadSettings)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class and loads the data from the specified string.
member.param: The string representing the Ini content.

member.name: T:IniFile.IniLoadSettings
member.summary: The settings to use when loading INI data from files, streams and text readers.

member.name: M:IniFile.IniLoadSettings.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:IniFile.IniLoadSettings.Encoding
member.summary: Gets or sets the character encoding to use when loading or saving INI data.

member.name: P:IniFile.IniLoadSettings.DetectEncoding
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to automatically detect the character encoding when loading INI data.

member.name: P:IniFile.IniLoadSettings.CaseSensitive
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to consider section and property key names as case sensitive, when searching for them by name.

member.name: F:IniFile.IniLoadSettings.Default
member.summary: Default settings to use to load INI data.
